Key Match Events: Darius Garland scored a season-high 40 points
Jarrett Allen had 18 points and 15 rebounds
Evan Mobley finished with 21 points, 11 rebounds and six assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers are tied for the fifth-best record in league history through 37 games at 33-4
Cleveland also has the top home mark in the NBA, going 20-1 at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse
Others: Scottie Barnes had 24 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists for Toronto
Chris Boucher added 23 points and 12 rebounds off the bench
Donovan Mitchell was given the night off after playing a team-high 35 minutes Wednesday in a 129-122 win over the Thunder
Toronto is a league-worst 1-17 on the road and has lost 15 of its last 16 overall
